message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $16500. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand your position, I still believe that $15000 is the maximum I can pay for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, but I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm counteroffering at $17000, which is a significant discount from my initial offer. This is my final concession, so I hope we can meet in the middle.

Alice, thank you for your final offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I must respectfully decline. I am unable to meet you at $17000 due to my budget constraints. I would like to continue our discussion, if possible, and see if we can find a solution that satisfies both parties. My maximum offer remains $15000.
